story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0200:
Everything went as planned! We’ve secured
Zekrom and Reshiram at our base, and we
brought back N, the traitor!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0400:
With this, I’m now one step closer to achieving
my ideals.
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0500: What are you scheming this time?!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0700: “Friends”... Are you still saying things like that?
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0800: Pokémon are tools! Pokémon are weapons!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_0900:
It is I, Ghetsis, who will reign over that power and
rule the world!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1000:
Hehehe... If you’re truly that curious, I’ll tell you
my plan.
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1100:
I’ll use Zekrom and Reshiram to unleash Kyurem’s
true power—as spoken of in the legend of
Unova’s founding!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1300:
I was waiting for the opportunity to make those
two Legendary Pokémon mine...
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1400:
And Team Rocket so conveniently provided it
for me!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1500: It seems that man Giovanni still has some use...
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1600:
So you plan to trample on the hearts of the
Pokémon and people on this island...
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1700: I absolutely refuse to let that happen!
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_1900:
What are you going to do with your Pokémon
taken from you?
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_2000:
Just sit back and watch while the world
becomes mine.
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_2200:
I assume Ghetsis plans to fuse Zekrom, Reshiram,
and Kyurem together...
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_2300:
But merging three Pokémon into one is no easy
task. It takes time.
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_2400:
Before he can do it, we have to—
No, even if Kyurem takes on its true form...
story_teamplasma_01_02000/2401_1001_2500:
the sync pairs on Pasio can defeat that
man’s ambition.
